original_title: Dr Rabbit and the Tooth Defenders
overview: Share the adventures of Dr. Rabbit and Dr. Brushwell with children in this fun video. Meet ordinary characters who turn into Super Dentists and Tooth Defenders when the slimy Placulus and his band of plaque monsters come along. Together, the team undertakes a mission to protect Tooth City from the sugary villain and his sticky schemes!
title: Dr Rabbit and the Tooth Defenders
